I'd highly recommend giving "The Lazarus Effect" a try! It's a thrilling horror comedy about a group of scientists who discover a way to bring dead patients back to life. Starring Mark Duplass, Olivia Wilde, and Donald Glover, it's sure to keep you on the edge of your seat with its suspenseful and humorous scenes.

Another interesting option is "You" – this psychological horror film raises thought-provoking questions about morality and responsibility when a gun is involved in tragic events. It stars an ensemble cast, including  (cast members). Give it a watch for a unique and captivating horror experience!
